txt.en: The Fishermen: Meat for a Cold Journey's End
The fishermen have offered to carry meat to Forlaw to help bolster the food stores for refugees and townsfolk.

'All right, all right! We'll go, then! We shall even try to carry as much as we can, since them gentle-folk at Forlaw shiver and go hungry.\n\n'Food will be short. You kill the moose, we carry the meat, hm? Fair?'
'That's the stuff. Give it here, eh, and I'll see it gets safe into hungry bellies.'
Moose can be found in the Whitshaws, especially towards the north.\n\nYou should hunt moose and bring cuts of meat to the fishermen, so that they may bring it to Forlaw to help feed the people there.
Morcar can be found at the fishermen's camp in the northern Whitshaws, on the edge of the Isingmere.\n\nYou should bring the cuts of meat to Morcar.
